contentList.content: Uses sinister Psychic magic from a connection to the Void itself to eradicate enemies.
Spew forth a conical wave of psychic energy against enemies.

Spew forth a conical wave of psychic energy against enemies. If a target has <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SWP">Sahdow Word: Pain</LSTag>, they will be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> if they fail their <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrows">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Utter a word of darkness that causes [1] now and at the start of each of their turns until they succeed an Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrows">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Taking [1] each turn until you succeed an Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrows">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Assume a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHADOWFORM">Shadowform</LSTag>, increasing all Psychic damage you deal by [1], and reducing Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage you take by [2].
Dealing Radiant damage or casting a Healing Spell blocks your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHADOWFORM">Shadowform</LSTag> for the rest of combat.
<LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shadowform">Shadowform</LSTag> can't be used again for the rest of combat.
Using this spell will end your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHADOWFORM">Shadowform</LSTag> and prevent it from being used again for the rest of combat.
